meanings.definition: Not able to be quenched or satisfied.
meanings.sent1: The boy's unquenchable thirst led him to drink all the water in the bottle.
meanings.sent2: Her unquenchable curiosity drove her to explore every corner of the museum.
meanings.sent3: The unquenchable puppy kept chasing its tail in circles, never getting tired.
meanings.sent4: His unquenchable desire for knowledge burned brighter than a thousand suns.
meanings.sent5: The unquenchable flame of passion in her eyes never dimmed.

meanings.sent1: The unquenchable hunger of the wolf made it hunt for food all night.
meanings.sent2: His unquenchable ambition pushed him to strive for success against all odds.
meanings.sent3: The unquenchable love for chocolate made her eat a whole box in one sitting.
meanings.sent4: Her unquenchable need for adventure led her to travel to far-off lands.
meanings.sent5: The unquenchable longing for freedom echoed in his heart like a thunderous drum.
